OOC:Wahtever we will jsut go from there then...so you are in the
air....high ok then...

::Grounded::
Grounded could see through the mist he had surrounded himself with and
saw the laser  coming thinkin quickly he began to transform into his
tree state hoping his tough bark could take the hit...AS he popped up
4 lasers knicked him along the sides ripping bark right
off.."yowww...that didn't work" He opend his link to Windlord" Start
flying at the mist and get ready to hsoot...I will cut it off so it
hsould clear jsut as you get to it's position and you could catch him
by surprise....."He said beginning to transform back into a bot and
stopping his plants  from spreading th mists even more...

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> OOC: Oh, okay, considering I shot before the red myst even started. and
> Even if there was a myst making it hard to see, Wildrider's gun shoot a
> spread of 8 lasers per trigger pull, so shooting blind even one of my
> lasers would hit. Next time could you guys at least state you dodge
them.
> And Wildrider is still in the air.
>
> Wildrider looks down on all of this chaos being created, and is a little
> disapointed in the inefectivness of this attack, considering he is still
> very high in the air. He soars upwards a ways, even further out of
danger.
> He again fires a torent of lasers at them.
